item.title: Nueral Network Learning Notes
item.description: Hello here. CNN Conv Layer Conv Layer is usually decreasing the input size, i.e., the output size may less or equal than input. take a volume as input: height x weight x depth, e.g., 32x32x3. Typically think an image having three channels: R, G, B. a filter has the same depth as the input volume, e.g., 5x5x3 (since the filter always has a same depth as input vloume, the depth of the filter is sometimes omitted).
